name: Three Brains, Trois cerveaux, 三种脑
name_original: Three Brains, Trois cerveaux, 三种脑
description:
I often feel neither here nor there as an ethnic Chinese Singaporean who doesn't speak Mandarin well and who grew up speaking English as my first language. Add my conversationally basic French and you have a truly bizarre situation. 

I designed this game as a tiny insight into what it's like to have knowledge of three languages but to also be so limited in those domains that to describe myself as trilingual doesn't completely sit right with me.
